Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is quicker and can give me basic pointers but I struggle to adapt to my specific requirements. My teacher is able to address my specific requirements but will often be slow or unresponsive

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI always has made me feel good whereas my teachers feedback has elicited a range of feelings, I think that means my teacher is reviewing my work more beneficially than the GenAI

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback seems to be very basic unless I know EXACTLY what I want, teachers are hyper-specific and thus more helpful
